name: Cubentine
description:
Cubentine is an Android Game .

The name of the game comes from the mere fact this game was made during 2020 Quarantine period and its all about simple cubes and no other structures.

The Game contains 3 levels only. Level of difficulty will increase with increase in each level. The UI is extremely simple to understand and graphics are compatible with any low end android device as well.

HOW TO INSTALL:
  1. Download the setup file from my page.
  2. Install the file manually on your android device from the downloaded location.
  3. Allow access to install external app on your mobile settings.
  4. Open game after installation.
  5. Press 'Start' to start the game play.

Do remember that the levels you play are not dynamically saved. So if you quit the application, mid-game, you will have to play the game from start.

The Total play time of the game is barely 5 mins. Depending on the player.

HOW TO PLAY :
  • Make sure you put your phone in landscape mode to play the game to full efficiency.
  • The screen is divided into two parts - Left side of the screen and Right side of the screen.
  • Press MILDLY on the left side to move the player cube to the left.
  • Press MILDLY on the right side to move the player cube to the right.
  • IF you hit any obstacle on the way, your level will restart.
  • You have to pass through without hitting any object cubes on the way to finish the level.
The game is very beginner friendly in terms of UI. The secret is held in the way you press the sides of the screen. The moment you understand the sensitivity settings, you'll be the master. 

But then of course, this game can push you to your limits and make you break your phone but.... don't.

Have fun cubing. Do leave reviews. Stay safe. Donate if you can. Okay bye.
